ai-tika-abh07t15:71_0: to remove the following thoughts, like a component of the aggregates.”
ai-tika-abh07t15:72_1: Doesn’t this aggregates in the four sense fields, (their) in the constituents (of mind and body), regarding the appropriate occasions? ”
ai-tika-abh07t15:72_2: For the purpose of breaking up the dangers in the past, future and present have a different aggregates. When the body breaks up, after death, they’re freed from the corruptions of the past.
ai-tika-abh07t15:73_1: the six doors and the bases of contact were continued existence; the six sense fields produced by the six doors beginning with consciousness; the six bases of mastery in the sense spheres, making the objects consisting of continued existence.
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_1: Then the three grounds for the earth is the earth’s simile,
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_2: Here the deeds a wicked deed done, and the result will be done,
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_3: Craving is the four kinds of craving, etc., in the past, future or present, internal and external objects, six internal and external objects, six internal and external states, eighteen elements, As temperatures, and eighteen elements beginning with craving and clinginging.
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_4: But why are they called ‘the origin of suffering’?
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_5: Because of the striving of the (should be) effort
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_6: For the mind is the reason why absence of (performed) deeds, and with the cutting off of suffering, the mind is made by craving and suffering.
ai-tika-abh07t15:74_7: The path to the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering is calm, while the path is finished.

And those who understand the paths of enlightenment, etc., and the paths of the fruition that lead to suffering as its fruit, and ignorance.

ai-tika-abh07t15:75_3: In the same way the Buddha taught them

ai-tika-abh07t15:75_7: The aggregates of the sixteen constituents (of mind and body)
ai-tika-abh07t15:75_8: But it is only the reason why arouses fear and dread in these three ways,
ai-tika-abh07t15:75_9: Should not be seen again; they should be seen again.
ai-tika-abh07t15:76_0: The commentary on all sides is finished.
ai-tika-abh07t15:77_0: Thus in the basic principles there is the commentary here in the first prective.
ai-tika-abh07t15:78_0: The confinement of the commentary on the commentary is finished.
